/usr/bin/g++      -fPIC -O0 -g3 -rdynamic CMakeFiles/optixPathTracer.dir/optixPathTracer.cpp.o -o ../bin/optixPathTracer  -Wl,-rpath,/home/joewebb/OptiX2/build-SDK-Desktop-Debug/lib:/home/joewebb/OptiX2/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 ../lib/libsutil_sdk.so /home/joewebb/OptiX2/lib64/liboptix.so -Wl,--disable-new-dtags -lm -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
